qas.question: Beyonce has a clothing line known as what?

context: In <a3_0>2006<a3_0/>, the animal rights organization People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), criticized Beyoncé <a4_0>for wearing and using fur<a4_0/> in her clothing line <a0_0><a8_0>House of Deréon<a0_0/>.<a8_0/> In 2011, she appeared on the cover of <a9_0>French fashion magazine<a9_0/> <a1_0><a5_0><a7_0>L'Officiel<a7_0/><a5_0/><a1_0/>, <a6_0>in <a2_0>blackface and tribal makeup<a6_0/><a2_0/> that drew criticism from the media. A statement released from a spokesperson for the magazine said that Beyoncé's look was "far from the glamorous Sasha Fierce" and that it was "a return to her African roots".
